channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kayo Yin's Blog

item.title: NeuroMV: A Neural Music Visualizer
item.description: In this project, we visualize songs using images that pulsate and move along with the music using Compositional Pattern Producing Networks (CPPN). In addition, the images we use are recognizable or reminiscent of the songs themselves to help viewers feel a connection with the music and gain a deeper appreciation for it.
